question_stem: Q5. The train set and the test set used to form the KNN classifier in “pred” are the same which is all the data points given in the original data set. True or False?
question_stem_html: Q5. The train set and the test set used to form the KNN classifier in “pred” are the same which is all the data points given in the original data set. True or False?

choices.explanation:
ANS: True.










PART II
There are 9 students with the names are: A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H and I. We would want to form 3 groups where each group has 2 students by a random way. The R code is given in the photo below.

items.solution:
ANS: True.
